key.name: api-url
key.description: The URL of the keylightd API server

key.name: api-key
key.description: The API key for authenticating with the keylightd server

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: How often to refresh light states in seconds

key.name: debounce-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds before sending control updates to lights. Higher values reduce network traffic but make controls less responsive.

key.name: enable-logging
key.description: Enable debug logging to the console

key.name: log-level
key.description: The minimum log level to display (debug, info, warning, error)

key.name: visible-groups
key.description: List of group IDs that should be visible in the quick settings menu.

key.name: visible-lights
key.description: List of light IDs that should be visible in the quick settings menu.

key.name: animation-duration
key.description: Duration of animations in milliseconds when toggling lights.

key.name: prefs-default-width
key.summary: Default width for the preferences window

key.name: prefs-default-height
key.summary: Default height for the preferences window

key.name: max-height-percent
key.description: Maximum percent of the screen height the lights scroll view can use (range: 0.25 to 0.75).
